Description: Wake up each morning watching the sunrise, the boats sail by JFK Library, or see the city skyline on the deck of 90 G Street. This 3 bedroom/2 bath penthouse condo has all the modern amenities: a stainless kitchen with custom cabinets, wine fridge, AC, hardwood floors, washer/dryer in unit, custom built in closets, steam shower, storage. .. and THE UNPARALLELED VIEW.
